# Shaft Miner SOP This is the list of procedures, responsibilities, and duties of the [color=#846326]Shaft Miner[/color] of this station.
1. Shaft Miners are not permitted to hoard materials. All materials must be placed into the Ore Silo.
2. Shaft Miners are bound by the same laws as [color=#846326]Cargo Technician[/color]s when doing any Cargo work.
3. Shaft Miners should return any contraband found in space to the Security Department immediately upon returning to the station.
4. Shaft Miners are not permitted to use any weapons found on Lavaland except for personal defense while mining (on Lavaland). A permit is required when returning to the station to allow further use of the weaponry. It should be approved by Captain, Head of Security, and/or Warden [bold]and[/bold] the Quartermaster.
5. Shaft Miners are not permitted to any of the Salvage Specialists locker equipment nor do mining in space.
